Title: I want to be a three-good student
Publisher: Heilongjiang meishu chubanshe (黑龙江美术出版社)
Notes: A three-good student has a good morality, good learning and good health. It is an honorary title for outstanding students. The selection of "three good students" started in 1954, with a fixed selection ratio, in all the large, medium and primary schools in China.
Theme: Socialist Spiritual Civilization (1980-2000)New Year Prints (and chubby babies)
